section.title: Form Modeler
section.para: The jBPM Form Modeler is a form engine and editor that enables users to create forms to capture and display information during process or task execution, without needing any coding or template markup skills.
It provides a WYSIWYG environment to model forms that it's easy to use for less technical users.

listitem.para: Form Modeling WYSIWYG UI for forms
Form autogeneration from data model / Java objects

section.para: The form modeler's user interfaces is aimed both at process analyst and developers for building and testing forms.
Developers or advanced used will also have some advanced features to customize form behavior and look&feel.
